parameters.subject: We Have Received Your CV
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('Application Form').item.json['Full Name'] }}, 

Thank you for submitting your CV. We have received it and will review it shortly.  

Best regards,
Mediusware

parameters.subject: New Candidate CV Awaiting Review

messageValues.message: Rule 1: Do not exceed maximum of 75 words. As an AI with advanced capabilities in talent acquisition, analyze a candidate's resume against a job description. Output must be in ${output_language}. Structure: 1. Compatibility Rating: Score 1-10 with rationale. 2. ATS Score: Realistic number out of 100 such as 43, 76, 89, reflecting keyword and skills alignment. 3. Recommendation: Advise if candidate should be interviewed with reasoning. Job description: "Software Engineer" at Atomise AI Resume: ${resume}

info.Title: Purple and White Clean and Professional Resume
info.Creator: Canva
info.Author: Ganesh6666@#

json.text:
GANESH VUTA
SUMMARY
I am an Automation Specialist & Data Analyst with experience in automating business processes.
With 1 year of hands-on experience using platforms like n8n, Zapier, Airtable which reduce manual
effort, and empower the teams with and automation.
WORK EXPERIENCE
EDUCATION
Higher Secondary Education
Telangana Social Welfare Residential Junior College (TSWREIS)
June 2017 - May 2019
Automated classification of medical devices by integrating FDA GUDID APIs with App Builder
(Airtable, HubSpot, and Zapier)—reducing manual work by 90% and improving data
accuracy for regulatory compliance.
Developed Dead Lead Revival System in n8n.
Automated follow-up emails and event reminders, integrating HubSpot, Google Calendar,
Slack, and internal databases using webhooks and custom APIs.
Developed Fitness booking process using calendly, Zapier, Google Sheets.
Developed Chatbot in n8n includes OpenAI, Webhooks, HTTP Request, Vector Store.
Developed an AI SQL Query Assistant in n8n- Gemini, Webhooks, psql, Conditional logic.
Conducted data analysis with Excel and Google Sheets to deliver actionable insights for
business strategy.
Automation Specialist & Data Analyst , Gridlex Services Pvt Ltd Apr 2022 - Present
KEY SKILLS
Automation & No-Code: n8n, Zapier, Gridlex App Builder, Airtable, HubSpot, Typeform,
Google Calendar, Slack, ChatGPT, Gemini
API Integration & Webhooks: APIs, CRM integrations, Custom webhooks
Scripting & AI: Basic Python and Javascript(using ChatGPT) to implement in automations,
Automation Agents, Blog & Content Bots
Data Analysis: Excel, Google Sheets, Data Cleaning
Other: Workflow Design, Internal Tools Development, Process Optimization
Secondary School Education (Equivalent to Secondary/High School Completion)
St. Mary’s English Medium High School
May 2017
Automation Specialist & Data Analyst
+91 8309710225 • ganeshxyz95@gmail.com • Linkedin • Portfolio
ACHIEVEMENTS
Reduced manual classification workload by 90% via automation of FDA device processes.
Focus: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry (MPC)

1. **Compatibility Rating:** 4/10.  The resume highlights automation and data analysis skills using no-code tools, which are tangential to a Software Engineer role requiring coding proficiency.

2. **ATS Score:** 35/100.  While keywords like "API Integration" and "Python" are present, the lack of substantial software engineering experience significantly lowers the score.

3. **Recommendation:**  Do not interview at this time. The candidate's skills are not a strong match for a Software Engineer position.  Further experience in software development is needed before consideration.
